First strike
When Elma attacks, if it’s an artifact, untap all artifacts you control. Elma becomes an Alien Soldier that’s no longer an artifact until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional main phase, followed by an additional combat phase.
notes: 2.1.0: This change was a long time coming. Elma is already such a bomb that being able to block so well the turn before it attacks shut down any attempts to race.
